item.title: Netflix Earnings: What to Watch For
item.description: Bloomberg’s Ryan Vlastelica discusses what investors will be looking for in Netflix’s earnings now that the company will no longer share subscriber numbers. He joins Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech.” (So

item.title: MikMak sees Potential for Advertising Clients on Netflix
item.description: Ahead of Netflix earnings, Rachel Tipograph, MikMak Founder & CEO, says Netflix is in its early days of tapping into the advertising business. (Source: Bloomberg)
